event_summary: Maritime history symposium exploring age of exploration, naval archaeology, and Portuguese seafaring heritage.
commentary_summary: Historians emphasized the comprehensive coverage of Portugal's maritime legacy and excellent preservation of historical artifacts.
next_event_plan: Create interactive maritime museum exhibits and develop sailing heritage educational programs
event_highlight: Unveiling of newly restored 16th-century Portuguese carrack ship replica
event_object: To preserve and celebrate Portugal's maritime history and its impact on global exploration
event_conclusion: Presented 40 research papers, displayed 200 historical artifacts, and attracted 20 international museum partnerships
event_conclusion_overall: Enriching symposium that honored Portugal's seafaring tradition and advanced maritime historical scholarship
next_event_suggestion: Include hands-on navigation workshops using traditional methods and create maritime archaeology field school
